attributes.action: Take The Following Measures To Move The Tax Burden Away From the Low Waged
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Fuel Is not a luxery item, without it we can not get to work or heat our homes, we would like to see duty reduced on fuel and to pay for this increase duty in other area`s.

Remove Tax From Domestic Heating Oil
Reduce Tax on Petrol & Diesel by 20%
Reduce 20% Tax Band To 19%

To Pay For These Tax Cuts

Increase The Upper PAYE from 40% to 47%
Add 30% Duty To Cigerettes
Add 30% To Alcholic Drinks

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
